content: enjoy a single little pansy flower set in greenery this is a small three dimensional block which will be approximately 4 5 in dk 6 in worsted with a final stitch count of 19 stitches per side the pansy is asymmetrical with colour changes within the flower for a jaunty natural look this is the little sister to pot of pansies 1 which is the may 2025 square in the 2025 crochet block a month group 2 where there will be discussion and help the pansy motifs are the exactly the same 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pot-of-pansies 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/2025-crochet-block-a-month-cal
